id: Will Canada lower the corporate tax rate to address competitiveness?EconomyTop Stories
paragraph: October 24, 20183:04 PM EDTA lower corporate tax rate? New policy measures to enhance Canada’s competitiveness? Deloitte’s chief economist Craig Alexander spoke with Financial Post’s Larysa Harapyn on what to expect from Finance Minister Bill Morneau’s fall fiscal update.We want to improve your reading experience
